itemDescription: English rugby union footballer and coach

wikipedia_page.main: Martyn Benjamin Wood (born 25 April 1977 in Harrogate) was the Director of Rugby at Yorkshire Carnegie in the RFU Championship, he was previously a rugby union scrum-half who played for Wasps and Bath. In 2001 he gained 2 caps for England.

response: | Lawrence Dallaglio, Martyn Wood, Joe Worsley
* Martyn Wood – England international rugby union footballer.
Leon Lloyd and Martyn Wood were called up on 23 September as injury replacements for Kyran Bracken and David Rees.
